)
static

Defined in error-code-registry.js:107

Add an XError constructor to the list. Used to manage different versions of XError.

getErrorCode

(
  • code
)
Object static

Defined in error-code-registry.js:75

Fetches information about error codes. The returned object may include the fields 'code' (useful if the error code is aliased to a different code), 'message' (default error message), 'http' (associated http code). Any of these fields may be missing.

Parameters:

  • code String
    • The error code to fetch

Returns:

Object:
  • Information about the returned error

listErrorCodes

() String static

Defined in error-code-registry.js:96

Returns a list of error code strings.

Returns:

String:
  • List of error codes

registerErrorCode

(
  • code
  • fields
  • [version]
)
static

Defined in error-code-registry.js:22

Registers an error code with the central registry.

Parameters:

  • code String
    • The error code to register
  • fields Object
    • Informational fields about the error
    • [message] String optional
      • Error message associated with the code
    • [aliasOf] String optional
      • If this error code is an alias, this is the code it is aliased to
    • [http] Number optional
      • HTTP response code associated with the error
  • [version] Number optional
    • The version of error fields; if the same code is registered multiple times, the higher version takes precedence. This defaults to 1.

registerErrorCodes

(
  • codes
  • version
)
static

Defined in error-code-registry.js:61

Register multiple error codes at the same time.

Parameters:

  • codes Object
    • Mapping from code strings to fields
  • version Number
